programme.desc: Egypt and Mike take on one of their biggest renovations to date as they transform a couple's 1980s house into an elegant, high-end estate.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home (S18)
programme.desc: After outgrowing their California dream home, David helps lottery winners find a bigger place with lots of outdoor space in the Las Vegas suburbs!

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild (S1)
programme.desc: Jack goes to St. Louis where a Catholic church has undergone a conversion, and to the California desert where a colour burst has recently been sold.

programme.title: Down Home Fab (S2)
programme.desc: Chelsea and Cole deliver a design for empty nesters who need their own space for their new chapter but want enough function for family gatherings.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU (S6)
programme.desc: Mario Lopez is back in the classroom to surprise his longtime friend and makeup artist with a kitchen and homeschool space renovation.

programme.title: Tough Love With Hilary Farr (S2)
programme.desc: Hilary has plenty of ideas for a family's cramped home. But the couple's colour obsession may threaten to derail her design plan.

programme.title: Motel Rescue (S1)
programme.desc: Lindsey Kurowski takes her expertise to Guerneville, CA to help the owner of a rustic cabin motel that hasn't been updated in decades.

programme.desc: Pick-Up Girl

programme.title: Tumakas Ka Sa Mundong Makasalanan
programme.desc: Sexy screen nymphet Ynez Veneracion is Eva, a young and carefree village lass. Though poor, her family leads a happy life, except for one thing: Cadio, her stepfather has become a compulsive gambler.

programme.title: Menor De Edad
programme.desc: High school student Jen Guilarman lives in misery with her abusive mother and her mom's lesbian lover. Looking for some escape, she aims to join an all-girl gang which first requires her to undergo a sexual rite.

programme.title: Dr. X On The Air
programme.desc: Joe de Lirio (Leo Martinez) is a sexiologist, but he is better known as a radio personality. In his raunchy but highly rated radio program, "Dr. X" he gives out advice to sexually troubled women. But just as Joe is gaining a loyal following among wives, he too is earning the ire of husbands.

programme.title: The Barker
programme.desc: Coco (Empoy Marquez), is a simple jeepney barker who falls in love with Bella (Sky Carlos). Desperate to prove himself to Bella's family, Coco puts his life on the line to save them from kidnappers.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Wish You Were The One
programme.desc: A woman trying to crash a wedding, in hopes of winning her ex back, finds luck when she meets a man going to the same wedding. They then pretend to be engaged.

programme.title: Leona Calderon
programme.desc: Leona Calderon is a retiring altruistic music lover earning her living cleaning establishments and private homes. Leona's wit and fun nature will make you smile, laugh and cry.

programme.title: Dahil May Isang Ikaw
programme.desc: Anya (Regine Velasquez) accidentally bumps Andrew's (Aga Muhlach) car while backing up. Both were arguing whose fault it was. Later Anya discovers that Andrew is her client and she apologizes. She offers to treat him out to dinner. This becomes the start of the proverbial beautiful friendship.

programme.title: Reyna
programme.desc: Ginnieffer Balisteros, a sad,insecure and desperate woman who feels the need to win a beauty pageant to prove her self-worth.

programme.title: Untrue
programme.desc: A bruised and beaten wife named Mara (Cristine Reyes) seeks the help of Georgian police against her husband Joachim (Xian Lim). In this He-she said film, truths, lies and the dark past will be uncovered.

programme.title: Bulaklak ng Maynila
programme.desc: Itâ€™s a world where crime is common place but money is scarce. Itâ€™s a place where the strong is king and the weak is prey. Welcome to Adaâ€™s (Angelu de Leon) world.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout the world, there are ancient structures that defy explanation. How were ancient civilisations able to build such extraordinary structures? And what purpose did they serve?

programme.title: Mountain Men (S13)
programme.desc: Marty installs floats on his bush plane and flies to a remote lake to hunt moose; Lauro and Neil harvest driftwood and build a log river raft from scratch.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, the board game industry is aimed almost entirely at children, until a literal game changer comes along in Trivial Pursuit. Redefining the possibilities for adult fun.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: There have been many sacred relics believed to be imbued with mystical powers. Is it possible that these ordinary items, like a tooth, or a soldier's spear, can have the ability to perform miracles?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten mysterious devices, from strange, grooved discs found in a cave in China to an ancient Greek computer to an incredible crystal skull unearthed in Mexico.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: The modern concept of 'extreme sports' is a product of marketing, but back in the old days, the rules of our nation's sports made them truly extreme. From bone-crushing football to deadly baseball games.

programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Saan Darating Ang Umaga (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: With Shane now already grown up and in college, her parents decided to adopt a little boy to complete their family. But after the excitement of his arrival has worn off, Shane began to have feelings of jealousy towards the boy her parents were now so enchanted with.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Ang Tipo Kong Lalake
programme.desc: Boy (Joey De Leon) and (Dennis Padilla) were professional thieves until they were caught. Then after ten years in prison, they were finally released. Their search for a place to stay led them to a ladies' dormitory that Boy insists belongs to his grandfather.

programme.title: Anino Ni Asedillo
programme.desc: The legacy of the legendary hero Asedillo (Fernando Poe, Jr.) lives on. A simple school teacher who fought for the rights of others at the cost of his life. Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Ex-Army
programme.desc: Lt. Emil Medrano is a bemedalled military officer assigned to infiltrate the communist movement. On his way to the movement's stronghold, he becomes involved in an encounter between soldiers and the rebels.

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Hinukay Ko Na Ang Libingan Mo
programme.desc: Vera, a singer in a night club, catches the attention of Mr. Larosa. However, she is already engaged to Anton and completely ignores Larosa's advances.

programme.title: Ma'am, May We Go Out (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey were lazy bums who would inherit a fortune if they would be able to graduate from high school. It was not easy but it helped that the P.E. teacher is Carmi Martin.
